Source.Name: rpi-imager
Source.Summary: Raspberry Pi Imager can flash an OS to a sdcard for use in your rpi with options to make the initial configuration easier pre-boot.
Source.Description: Raspberry Pi Imager can flash an OS to a sdcard for use in your rpi with options to make the initial configuration easier, such as setting up username, password, hostname, wifi, sshd and locale before the initial boot.

Package.Name: rpi-imager
Package.Summary: Raspberry Pi Imager can flash an OS to a sdcard for use in your rpi with options to make the initial configuration easier pre-boot.
Package.Description: Raspberry Pi Imager can flash an OS to a sdcard for use in your rpi with options to make the initial configuration easier, such as setting up username, password, hostname, wifi, sshd and locale before the initial boot.
